description:
In supporting Internet Explorer but this was a pretty major issues and we should be more explicit in recommending Firefox/Chrome or highlighting known issues with IE.
As reported by Helene Dudley of TCP Global, when selecting activation dates for clients, groups, centers, etc - the dates don't get properly saved/displayed

### How to Submit

Submit a pull request linking to the issue and include the link to the pull request in your submission through the GCI Portal.
name: Mifos- IE: Dates don't get properly displayed - show as NaN undefined 0NaN
